--- Lilith <lillith.saintcrow@...> wrote:

 As for the book, I was wondering:
> I know this 
> isn't a writing critique group, but if I posted the
> backstory- about 
> how the revenge gets set up, the basic kernal of the
> story- would you 
> guys be willing to take a look and tell me if it's
> _logical_ enough? 
> I know there is a definite component of fantasy, and
> I am making very 
> free with some aspects of the Japanese culture, but
> I'd at least like 
> to get as close as I can to _some_ kind of
> historical accuracy.

Feel free within the limits of what publishers will
let you put up here--most of us here will be happy to
help, if we can. I'm just glad to see an author who
cares about the details, and am eagerly awaiting your
book!

Nate
